items.sentence: Tom had no sooner walked in the door than Mary started to complain.
Having done my homework, I watched the baseball game on television.
Are you seriously thinking about buying a computer from that store?
Tom said he saw something weird on the other side of that mountain.
Tom said he thought Mary might have to stay in Boston until Monday.
Tom shared the food that his mother had given him with his friends.
Tom suggested that they convert the old church into a concert hall.
Tom was dissatisfied with the service at the hotel where he stayed.
Tom was just about to say something when Mary walked into the room.
Tom was teased because he looked different from the other children.
